Text:
so the game crashes after starting? save your time & turn BUMP MAPPING to low in graphics setting. should work fine after then. 

Enjoy
Sam

works great!! i'm running it on a little dell netbook, 1 gig ram 2 1.5gz , perfect, except it holds up on some missions (the first sniper one, etc) but all you have to do is press ` (enables cheats) and type Darman, that will skip over the buggy levels. Also install doesnt work, just run it anyway then launch directly from the sysem folder.
